prime time.translation[0].definitions[0]: the time in the evening when the largest number of people are watching television
a speech that was broadcast live during prime time
prime time.translation[1].definitions[0]: relating to the time in the evening when most people are watching television, and the cost of advertising is at its most expensive
The three major networksâ€™ combined share of the prime-time audience has fallen to a new low.
Warner will have about 20 series on prime-time television in the fall.
prime time.translation[2].definitions[0]: the time when most people are watching the television or listening to the radio, and therefore the most expensive time for advertising
The President usedprime time television for a brief, personalised appeal to voters.
Prime time is just before the 8 o'clock news.
